short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Teachable.com more user-friendly. Toggle the course sidebar, so the video takes up more screen without going full screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Teachable.com more user-friendly. This extension allows you to toggle the course sidebar, so the video takes up more screen real estate without going full screen.
